title: Metal free synthesis of thermally stable blue fluorescent m-terphenyls by ring transformation of 2H-pyran-2-ones: chemical synthesis, spectroscopy and computational studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16960-16970
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02375G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Priyanka B. Kole, Kokila Sakthivel, Sanja J. Armaković, Stevan Armaković, Muzaffar Iqbal, Fateh V. Singh, Shiva Prasad Kollur
A simple yet convenient nucleophile-induced synthetic route for the construction of thermally stable fluorescent active functionalized stilbenes has been delineated.
